messages.subject: Re: Byakkotai Related Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/MatsudairaBenz.jpg I give you the Matsudaira-Benz (^_^) okay, again use your imagination...it is entirely black with dark deep
messages.messageBody:
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/MatsudairaBenz.jpg
I give you the Matsudaira-Benz (^_^)
okay, again use your imagination...it is entirely black with dark
deep blue bullet proof tinted windows. I like the Mercedes
headlights but I decided to put them in a frame which reminds you of
cat's eyes. The grill has the shogunate crest.
Just imagine it drawn by a professional...remember this car is sooo
darn sexy that it is beloved by Matsudaira Katamori and his chaffeur
Saitou Hajime. Ofcourse when Matsudaira is out of town, the
Shinsengumi's vice chief may "borrow" it without permission.

Hijikata "SAitou you're going to have to take the blame for something-
-"

Saitou "?"

Hijikata "you'll know in a second"

Matsudaira K. "okay, someone has been using my car because I found -
this- in the backseat" (holds up female undergarment)

Hijikata elbows SAitou

Saitou (throws himself on the floor) "Please forgive me my lord it
was me I'm soo soo sorry"

Matsudaira K. "Why Saitou, I never knew you would stoop to such
behavior!"

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Byakkotai Related Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/12/2005 10:26:20 AM Eastern Standard Time, secretarytocapt3@.*** writes: http://1happyturtle.com/vid/wtmotorcycles.jpg again to get
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/12/2005 10:26:20 AM Eastern Standard Time,
secretarytocapt3@... writes:

http://1happyturtle.com/vid/wtmotorcycles.jpg
again to get the metal effect I'd have to sit there with a pencil
and sketch everything in but since I didn't have time I just
outlined the concept design with marker so it looks more gaudy than
I had intended. It was inspired by two different models of the
Honda motorcycle.

now your wondering..."huh?" makes no sense at all...
visit
http://1happyturtle.com/vid/index.htm

I will be finishing up designs for the other vehicles and characters
in the future...all the women are very cute (^_^) will post soon
Cool motorcycle Sec. Can you give us a hint what sort of ride the Shinsengumi
are going to have?

-MissB


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
